title: TrustXR: Trustworthy Risk Prediction from EHR
description: Temporal transformers with uncertainty estimation for early warning of sepsis and AKI across hospitals.

title: ClinNote-DA: Domain-Adapted Language Models
description: Adapting general LMs to clinical notes with minimal labels; concept extraction and document classification.

title: mHealth-XAI
description: Explainable time-series models for passive mental health sensing from wearables, with clinician-facing summaries.
